verses.verse: His foundation <S%H3248><s%> is in the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountains. <S%H2042><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> the gates <S%H8179><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> more than all the dwellings <S%H4908><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
Glorious things <S%H3513><s%> are spoken <S%H1696><s%> about you, <S%H5892><s%> city of God. <S%H430><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

I will record <S%H2142><s%> Rahab <S%H7294><s%> and Babylon <S%H894><s%> among those who acknowledge <S%H3045><s%> me. <S%H6429><s%> Behold, Philistia, Tyre, <S%H6865><s%> and also Ethiopia: <S%H3568><s%> "This one was born there. <S%H3205><s%>"
Yes, <S%H6726><s%> of Zion it will be said, <S%H559><s%> "This one and that one <S%H376><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> in her; <S%H5945><s%>" the Most High himself will establish her. <S%H3559><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will count, <S%H5608><s%> when he writes up <S%H3789><s%> the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> "This one was born <S%H3205><s%> there. <S%H5542><s%>" Selah.
Those who sing <S%H7891><s%> as well as those who dance <S%H2490><s%> say, <S%H4599><s%> "All my springs are in you."
